content: Mr. Jenkins, as you are the former Regional Field Director for Barack Obama’s Presidential campaign, and the former writer/researcher for Hillary Clinton’s campaign director, John Podesta, while employed by the Center for American Progress (CAP), which is funded by George Soros, who has admitted that he had no remorse for helping the Nazis steal from Jews during WWII, and currently, as you are a paid political advocate for the same organization’s Anti-Trump propaganda machine, I suggest that you contemplate the meaning of this verse from the book of Matthew (7:1–5), before casting aspersion on our President. “Why do you look at the speck that is in your brother’s eye, but do not notice the log that is in your own eye? “Or how can you say to your brother, ‘Let me take the speck out of your eye,’ and behold, the log is in your own eye? “You hypocrite, first take the log out of your own eye, and then you will see clearly to take the speck out of your brother’s eye.”
